- Material/location: Metal louvered vent cover (white enamel); interior HVAC return vent on wall/ceiling.
- Condition: Significant dust buildup on the grille and louvers; dirty behind the slats.
- Condition: Minor frame damage with paint chipping; small gap at top-right corner.
- Hardware: Screws present; no obvious rust; frame appears slightly loose in corner.
- Recommendation: Clean vent and ducts; inspect filter/duct condition; seal or repair frame to reduce air leakage.
